nodes.bodyText: Should you add return; after this line, to cede the flow of control from requestSubscription(...)?
Yikes...good eye on that one. I debated just making the function throw, but it started betting messy upstream.
What actually throws the ApiException? The buildConnectionRequestUrl() bit? The rest looks likes its pure OkHttp, and wouldn't throw one of our internal types.
Yeah...it's buried deep down into the code that adds the security headers.
